mapper.select:
SELECT r.id AS groupId, r.room_name AS roomName, r.head_url AS headUrl, r.current_members AS currentMembers, r.create_date AS createDate, r.description AS description, r.owner_id AS ownerId,
-- 用户专属信息 (来自 chat_user_room) ur.alias AS alias, ur.role AS userRole,
-- 查询最新公告的文本内容 ( SELECT a.content FROM chat_announce a WHERE a.room_id = r.id ORDER BY a.create_date DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS latestAnnounceContent
FROM chat_user_room ur JOIN chat_room r ON ur.room_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND ur.room_id = #{roomId} -- 确保用户在该群聊中是活跃状态（未退出/未被踢出） AND ur.is_exit = 0

select chat_user_room.id,user_id,role,username,head_image from chat_user_room join sys_user on chat_user_room.user_id = sys_user.id where room_id = #{roomId} and is_exit = 0 ORDER BY chat_user_room.role, -- 群主和管理员排前面 chat_user_room.create_date -- 其次按入群时间排序
select * from chat_user_room where user_id = #{userId} and room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.delete: delete from chat_user_room where user_id = #{userId} and room_id = #{roomId}
